scenes.description: Intro screen for hololive 6th fes. STAGE 2 featuring key visual artwork.
Visitor attention and guidelines regarding lighting and cheering (Japanese and English).
Penlight color reference guide for hololive members.
Continuous slideshow of supportive messages and illustrations from fans.
